body:
Hey y'all this is just a thread where we can support our friend __Dawson/xxJavaScriptxx!

Dawson has been banned recently for having too many infractions and the staff are deciding whether to unban him, so let's take a moment to show that we are all in support of our fellow Avicus brother Dawson!!!!

Good luckkk bro! Hope you get unbanned!

title: Dawson / Javascript Support Thread

replies.body: A thread for this is unnecessary, as it is focused on one person and spammy. Feel free to show support to him personally, but a topic isn't recommended.
